    CodeDisplayDefinition
    EmCare.A.DE13Estimated age in years/months for child (2 months or older)The age of the client is estimated based on physical evidence
    EmCare.A.DE14Estimated age in weeks/days for young infant (under 2 months old)The Caregiver provides the age in weeks/days/hours
    EmCare.A.DE15Estimated Date of BirthEstimated Date of Birth of the Client

name: valueset-dob-estimator
title: Provide an estimated age or estimated date of birth
description: The client/caregiver will provide an estimated age or estimated date of birth

designation.value: The age of the client is estimated based on physical evidence
